Seyed - I just started working in Fortran, and have Cantera installed on 
Linux. After installation, the Fortran files are in:
/usr/local/cantera/1.6.0/templates - the file for f77 is 
demo_ftnlib.cpp. When compiling my main Fortran program I needed to use 
the -fno-second-underscore option (in g77) and the linking can be done 
in either g77 or g++.
I don't know about using it in Windows.
There's also some documentation available on the sourceforge page as 
well (file f77.pdf).

Michael

Seyed-Reihani Seyed-Abdolreza wrote:
